Definition: Unique identifier for each retail store location
Display name of the store as it appears to customers
Unique identifier for the retail banner/brand that the store operates under
Unique identifier for the parent account that owns the store(s)
Name of the parent company or account that operates the store(s)
Street address of the store location
Postal code of the store location
Canadian province where the store is located
City or municipality where the store is located
Classification of the area type based on postalcode
Geographic latitude coordinate of the store location
Geographic longitude coordinate of the store location
